name: CUSTODIAN HUB DE INNOVACIÃ“N, S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Operator of an online insurance claims management platform designed to provide assistance in claiming auto insurance claims. The company's platform assists users to access insurance documents, offers guidance on what to do during accidents and tracks the status of the vehicle at all times, enabling users to simplify the insurance process.
